page.title: 14CUSTOMS IN MARKFIELD
page.content: MARKFIELD PARADE There is a parade once a year with a band at the front followed by majorettes,floats and fancy dress entrants. The parade is for Mecenfeld School's garden fete.The school used to give a prize for the best float but the Sunday School nearly always won.The prize was a box of sweets each.The Cubs and Scouts march with them too.After the parade is the fete with many stalls. FERRETING My hobby is looking after ferrets. I take them ferreting down the back fields. Most of my friends have them. Some can be very vicious but I get them young and handle them a lot and they learn not to bite. I feed them on eggs, bread, milk and water. When I get a rabbit or a pigeon I always give them the lights.
